Methods

(inner) chord(pitches, durations, attributes) → {Array}

Create a collection of simultaneus notes

You can specify a collection of pitches, durations and attributes and chord will arrange them as a collection of notes in simultaneus layout

Parameters:
Name Type Description
pitches String | Array

the chord note pitches
durations String | Array

the chord note durations
attributes Hash

the chord note attributes
Source:
  • notes.js, line 53
Returns:

a parallel musical structure

Type
Array
Example
score.phrase('A B C D E', 1)

(inner) phrase(pitches, durations, attributes) → {Array}
